medical_history.chief_complaint: Progressive deterioration of vision bilaterally over the past 2 years.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has experienced poor vision since early childhood, with notable motor development delays including holding his head up at 6-7 months and walking at 1.5 years old. Symptoms have progressively deteriorated over the past 2 years.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diagnosed with micropenis; no other significant past medical history disclosed.
medical_history.family_history: Both parents were emmetropic without any visual or systemic medical disorders; no other family history noted.
